wf_summary: Routes inbound Twilio calls into orchestration

nodes.name: Webhook_InboundCall
nodes.purpose: Entry point for Twilio inbound call

nodes.name: Validate_Envelope
nodes.purpose: Validate required fields from Twilio payload

nodes.name: Resolve_Identity
nodes.purpose: Call WF109 to resolve phone to lead_id

nodes.name: Log_Event
nodes.purpose: Call WF011 to log call.inbound event
